verses.verse: And the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Are <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%>?"

And he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G191>"Hear<s%> me, <S%G435>brethren<s%> <S%G80><s%> and <S%G3962>fathers!<s%> The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3708>appeared<s%> to our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> when he was in <S%G3318>Mesopotamia,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> he <S%G2730>lived<s%> in <S%G5488>Haran,<s%>
and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1831>'Depart<s%> from your <S%G1093>country<s%> and your <S%G4772>relatives,<s%> and <S%G1204>come<s%> into the <S%G1093>land<s%> that I will <S%G1166>show<s%> you.'

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> he <S%G1831>departed<s%> from the <S%G1093>land<s%> of the <S%G5466>Chaldeans,<s%> and <S%G2730>settled<s%> in <S%G5488>Haran.<s%> And from <S%G2547>there,<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> [God] <S%G3351>removed<s%> him into <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1093>country<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> you are <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2730>living.<s%>

"And He <S%G1325>gave<s%> him <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> in it, not <S%G3761>even<s%> a <S%G4228>foot<s%> of <S%G968>ground;<s%> and [yet,] even when he had <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5043>child,<s%> He <S%G1861>promised<s%> that He would <S%G1325>give<s%> it to him as a <S%G2697>possession,<s%> and to his <S%G4690>offspring<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> him.

"But <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>effect,<s%> that his <S%G4690>offspring<s%> would be <S%G3941>aliens<s%> in a <S%G245>foreign<s%> <S%G1093>land,<s%> and that they would be <S%G1402>enslaved<s%> and <S%G2559>mistreated<s%> for <S%G5071>four<s%> <S%G5071>hundred<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

"'And <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> to <S%G3739>which<s%> they shall be in <S%G1398>bondage<s%> I <S%G1473>Myself<s%> will <S%G2919>judge,<s%>' <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> 'and <S%G3326>after<s%> that they will <S%G1831>come<s%> out and <S%G3000>serve<s%> Me in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>'

"And He <S%G1325>gave<s%> him the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> of <S%G4061>circumcision;<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> [Abraham] <S%G1080>became<s%> the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> him on the <S%G3590>eighth<s%> <S%G2250>day;<s%> and <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> [became the father of] <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> [of] the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3966>patriarchs.<s%>
"And the <S%G3966>patriarchs<s%> became <S%G2206>jealous<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> and <S%G591>sold<s%> him into <S%G125>Egypt.<s%> And [yet] <S%G2316>God<s%> was with him,

and <S%G1807>rescued<s%> him from <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G2347>afflictions,<s%> and <S%G1325>granted<s%> him <S%G5485>favor<s%> and <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> in the <S%G1727>sight<s%> of <S%G5328>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt;<s%> and he <S%G2525>made<s%> him <S%G2233>governor<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> and <S%G3650>all<s%> his <S%G3624>household.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> a <S%G3042>famine<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> and <S%G5477>Canaan,<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> [with it;] and our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> could <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5527>food.<s%>
"But when <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that there was <S%G4619>grain<s%> in <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> he <S%G1821>sent<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> [there] the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4413>time.<s%>

"And on the <S%G1208>second<s%> [visit] <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1107>made<s%> himself <S%G1107>known<s%> to his <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and Joseph's <S%G1085>family<s%> was <S%G5318>disclosed<s%> to <S%G5328>Pharaoh.<s%>

"And <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> [word] and <S%G3333>invited<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G4772>relatives<s%> to come to him, seventy-five <S%G5590>persons<s%> [in all.]
"And <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G125>Egypt<s%> and [there] <S%G5053>passed<s%> <S%G5053>away,<s%> he and our <S%G3962>fathers.<s%>

"And [from there] they were <S%G3346>removed<s%> to <S%G4966>Shechem,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> in the <S%G3418>tomb<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> had <S%G5608>purchased<s%> for a <S%G5092>sum<s%> of <S%G694>money<s%> from the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G1697>Hamor<s%> in <S%G4966>Shechem.<s%>

"But as the <S%G5550>time<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> was <S%G1448>approaching<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G3670>assured<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G837>increased<s%> and <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> in <S%G125>Egypt,<s%>

<S%G891>until<s%> there <S%G450>arose<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3609>knew<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G3609>about<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph.<s%>

"It was he who <S%G2686>took<s%> <S%G2686>shrewd<s%> <S%G2686>advantage<s%> of our <S%G1085>race,<s%> and <S%G2559>mistreated<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> so that they would <S%G4160>expose<s%> <S%G1570><s%> their <S%G1025>infants<s%> and they would not <S%G2225>survive.<s%>

"And it was at <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> that <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was <S%G1080>born;<s%> and he was <S%G791>lovely<s%> in the <S%G3588>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and he was <S%G397>nurtured<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%> in his father's <S%G3624>home.<s%>
"And after he had been <S%G1620>exposed,<s%> Pharaoh's <S%G2364>daughter<s%> <S%G337>took<s%> him <S%G337>away,<s%> and <S%G397>nurtured<s%> him as her <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5207>son.<s%>

"And <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was <S%G3811>educated<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4678>learning<s%> of the <S%G124>Egyptians,<s%> and he was a <S%G1415>man<s%> of <S%G1415>power<s%> in <S%G3056>words<s%> and <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

"But <S%G5613>when<s%> he was <S%G4137>approaching<s%> the <S%G5550>age<s%> of <S%G5066>forty,<s%> it <S%G305>entered<s%> his <S%G2588>mind<s%> to <S%G1980>visit<s%> his <S%G80>brethren,<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2274>Israel.<s%>

"And when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> [of them] being <S%G91>treated<s%> <S%G91>unjustly,<s%> he <S%G292>defended<s%> him and <S%G4160>took<s%> <S%G1557>vengeance<s%> for the <S%G2669>oppressed<s%> by <S%G3960>striking<s%> <S%G3960>down<s%> the <S%G124>Egyptian.<s%>

"And he <S%G3543>supposed<s%> that his <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G4920>understood<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G1325>granting<s%> them <S%G4991>deliverance<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> him; but they did not <S%G4920>understand.<s%>

"And on the <S%G7075>following<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> he <S%G3708>appeared<s%> to them as they were <S%G3164>fighting<s%> <S%G3164>together,<s%> and he tried to <S%G4871>reconcile<s%> them in <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G435>'Men,<s%> you are <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2443>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G91>injure<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%>?'

"But the one who was <S%G91>injuring<s%> his <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G683>pushed<s%> him <S%G683>away,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>'Who<s%> <S%G2525>made<s%> you a <S%G758>ruler<s%> and <S%G1348>judge<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> us?
'You do not <S%G2309>mean<s%> to <S%G337>kill<s%> me as you <S%G337>killed<s%> the <S%G124>Egyptian<s%> <S%G7088>yesterday,<s%> do you?'

"And at <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>remark<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G5343>fled,<s%> and <S%G1096>became<s%> an <S%G3941>alien<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G3099>Midian,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> he <S%G1080>became<s%> the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons.<s%>

"And after <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> had <S%G4137>passed,<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3708>appeared<s%> to him in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> of <S%G3735>Mount<s%> <S%G4614>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%G5395>flame<s%> of a <S%G4442>burning<s%> <S%G942>thorn<s%> <S%G942>bush.<s%>

"And when <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> it, he [began] to <S%G2296>marvel<s%> at the <S%G3705>sight;<s%> and as he <S%G4334>approached<s%> to <S%G2657>look<s%> [more] <S%G2657>closely,<s%> there <S%G1096>came<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

'I am the <S%G2316>God<s%> of your <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%> and <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%>' And <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1790>shook<s%> with <S%G1790>fear<s%> and would not <S%G5111>venture<s%> to <S%G2657>look.<s%>

"But the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3089>'Take<s%> <S%G3089>off<s%> the <S%G5266>sandals<s%> from your <S%G4228>feet,<s%> for the <S%G5117>place<s%> on <S%G3739>which<s%> you are <S%G2476>standing<s%> is <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1093>ground.<s%>

'I have <S%G3708>certainly<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G2561>oppression<s%> of My <S%G2992>people<s%> in <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> and have <S%G191>heard<s%> their <S%G4726>groans,<s%> and I have <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G1807>deliver<s%> them; <S%G1204>come<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> and I will <S%G649>send<s%> you to <S%G125>Egypt.<s%>'

<S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G720>disowned,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>'Who<s%> <S%G2525>made<s%> you a <S%G758>ruler<s%> and a <S%G1348>judge<s%>?' is the <S%G3778>one<s%> <S%G3778>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> [to be] <S%G2532>both<s%> a <S%G758>ruler<s%> and a <S%G3086>deliverer<s%> with the <S%G5495>help<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%> who <S%G3708>appeared<s%> to him in the <S%G942>thorn<s%> <S%G942>bush.<s%>

<S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G1806>led<s%> them out, <S%G4160>performing<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%> and <S%G4592>signs<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt<s%> and in the <S%G2063>Red<s%> <S%G2281>Sea<s%> and in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> for <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

<S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G3475>Moses<s%> who <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2274>Israel,<s%> <S%G2316>'God<s%> shall <S%G450>raise<s%> up for you a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> me from your <S%G80>brethren.<s%>'

<S%G3778>"This<s%> is the one who was in the <S%G1577>congregation<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G3326>together<s%> with the <S%G32>angel<s%> who was <S%G2980>speaking<s%> to him on <S%G3735>Mount<s%> <S%G4614>Sinai,<s%> and [who was] with our <S%G3962>fathers;<s%> and he <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3051>oracles<s%> to <S%G1325>pass<s%> on to you.

"And our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> were <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> to be <S%G5255>obedient<s%> to him, but <S%G683>repudiated<s%> him and in their <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4762>turned<s%> <S%G4762>back<s%> to <S%G125>Egypt,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying<s%> to Aaron, <S%G2>'Make<s%> for us <S%G4160>gods<s%> <S%G2316>who<s%> will <S%G3739>go<s%> <S%G4313>before<s%> us; for <S%G4313>this<s%> <S%G3778>Moses<s%> <S%G3475>who<s%> <S%G3739>led<s%> us out of the <S%G1806>land<s%> of <S%G1093>Egypt<s%> â€“ we do not <S%G125>know<s%> <S%G3609>what<s%> <S%G5101>happened<s%> to him.'

"And at that <S%G2250>time<s%> they <S%G3447>made<s%> a <S%G3447>calf<s%> and <S%G321>brought<s%> a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%G1497>idol,<s%> and were <S%G2165>rejoicing<s%> in the <S%G2041>works<s%> of their <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

"But <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4762>turned<s%> <S%G4762>away<s%> and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them up to <S%G3000>serve<s%> the <S%G4756>host<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> 'It was not to Me that you <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G4968>victims<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> was it, O <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2274>Israel<s%>?

'You <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G353>took<s%> along the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of <S%G3434>Moloch<s%> and the <S%G798>star<s%> of the <S%G2316>god<s%> <S%G4501>Rompha,<s%> the <S%G5179>images<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G4160>made<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> them. I <S%G2532>also<s%> will <S%G3351>remove<s%> you <S%G1900>beyond<s%> <S%G897>Babylon.<s%>'

"Our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1510>had<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of <S%G3142>testimony<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as He who <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1299>directed<s%> [him] to <S%G4160>make<s%> it <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5179>pattern<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he had <S%G3708>seen.<s%>

"And having <S%G1237>received<s%> it in their <S%G1237>turn,<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1521>brought<s%> it in with <S%G2424>Joshua<s%> upon <S%G2697>dispossessing<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1856>drove<s%> out <S%G575>before<s%> <S%G4383><s%> our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2250>time<s%> of <S%G7035>David.<s%>

"And [David] <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5485>favor<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1799>sight,<s%> and <S%G154>asked<s%> that he might <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4638>dwelling<s%> <S%G4638>place<s%> for the God of <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%>
"But it was <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> who <S%G3618>built<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%> for Him.
<S%G235>"However,<s%> the <S%G5310>Most<s%> <S%G5310>High<s%> does not <S%G2730>dwell<s%> in [houses] <S%G5499>made<s%> by [human] <S%G5499>hands;<s%> as the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> says: <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G3772>'Heaven<s%> is My <S%G2362>throne,<s%> And <S%G1093>earth<s%> is the <S%G5286>footstool<s%> of My <S%G4228>feet;<s%> <S%G4169>What<s%> <S%G4169>kind<s%> of <S%G3624>house<s%> will you <S%G3618>build<s%> for Me?' <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G2228>'Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> is there for My <S%G2663>repose<s%>?
'Was it not My <S%G5495>hand<s%> which <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>?'
